document.full_text: libyans are suffering dire shortages of food, water and medicine in areas caught up in the six-week-old civil war, above all in cities under siege from muammar gaddafi's forces, residents and aid workers say.
document.title: dire food, medicine shortages in libya conflict zone
lines_and_colors: libyans are suffering dire shortages of food, water and medicine in areas caught up in the six-week-old civil war, above all in cities under siege from muammar gaddafi's forces, residents and aid workers say.
